docs.lead_paragraph: The Toyota RAV4 got a “poor” passenger-side rating, and the Subaru Forester and Nissan Rogue only “marginal,” in crash tests conducted by a safety group.
docs.abstract: Insurance Institute for Highway Safety releases results of tests of seven vehicles, which found front passenger seats in some small sports utility vehicles may not be as well protected as driver seats, particularly in certain types of car crashes.
